Games surprisingly good looking and playing for it being over a decade old. The whole portal mechanic is still surprisingly innovative, and something you don't see in almost every game nowadays. Best dollar I've spent in a while.

(EDIT) Well, now Splitgate exists.

when i finished the game i really liked the end scene #nospoilers. i loved the look and smoothness to the game and the storyline is amazing. i am now starting Portal 2 and i am excited to see what will come. WOULD RECOMEND!!!
Prequel to Portal 2, Portal, is an all time classic. I recommend this game, but there isn’t much replayability

Quatro horas de Portal foram o suficiente pra me julgar capaz de tecer bons elogios a essa experiência. A dinâmica de portais é uma brincadeira empolgante e desafiadora, e além da gostosa, porém curta narrativa, ela consegue cativar, ainda mais se você já é familiar com as peripécias de Half Life. 

A história é interessante, o gameplay te instiga a experimentar as possibilidades e o jogo ainda tem a cena de créditos mais adorável da sua vida. Um imersivo e divertido jogo de puzzles dentro do fantástico e infelizmente finito (até então, né, o bolo tem que ser real) universo da Valve.

I was able to beat the game in 2 hours..... um what? That being said the game is a blast to play. Some quick on you feet action puzzles also with slow very though out puzzles. I wouldn’t pay full price for this game but I definitely would grab this while its on sale. The 2 hours I played in was only the story mode, as I have yet to still try out all the extra side missions and levels. Overall great game but was a little to short. Can’t wait to play Portal 2!!!
Maravilhoso! Bons puzzles, que casa muito bem com a jogabilidade simples. Eu demorei até demais para jogar essa obra prima! Vale muito a pena!

游戏做的很牛逼，毕竟V社，科技感十足，主角一把传送枪各种空间穿越。希望以后的科技水平真能研制出这种高科技玩意儿，玩儿这游戏需要点儿意志力和脑子，并且还可能需要克服游戏时间过长而产生的头晕，毕竟主角各种角度传来传去，整个人经常在空中360°花式落地，游戏难度不高，只要不发晕并且有策略思路就基本不会被卡住，上午下载的慢慢玩儿下午就通关了，第一代只有2个多G，不大，场景也不很多，整个游戏只有主角一个活人和一个AI机器人旁白，没什么剧情，没有对话，只有AI一直对着你叨叨，基本全是用脑子过图的，不需要太多手法的操作，有些地方把握好时机才能过去，一定不要迷路，把所处房间的四周都彻底看清，后期很多房间都是比较昏暗，有些出口真的很难发现，总的来说，很棒，觉得不错还可以玩儿玩儿第二部。（游戏结束后的那段歌曲也很好听）
